description: The official game of the Despicable Me franchise arrives on Windows 8, bringing Gru’s loyal, yellow, gibberish-speaking Minions to your screen in a high-speed, 3D endless runner. Whether you're dodging missiles in Gru’s Lab or sprinting through a Residential Area, Minion Rush delivers the heart and humor of the movies with addictive, fast-paced gameplay optimized for both touch and desktop.
